resources.string: A code has been sent to your SMS. Please check it and put in the box below to verify your account
Don\'t have an account? Register for FREE

Hello I\'m Vasco Cruz, a student in a engineering and multimedia course in ISEL. Currently my last year of studies. This Application was made for a subject during the month of August as a final project. It contains a little part of me. Development was hard and slow, but with a lot of persistence, hardwork and literal tears here it is. I Hope you find some use for it and have fun messaging with your friends!

Q: Why a messaging App as a final project?
A: A application that allows people to communicate is very versatile because it's as interesting as the people you are talking to. It provides a plataform for people to communicate and there's no need more basic to humans than that. To Share Stories. 
Q: Why do i have to register/add people by their email? Why cant i use a phone number?
A: In order not to charge users carrier fees the application is built using users emails.
Q:Recording sometimes crashes my application/notifications dont appear properly?
A: I'm aware of this issue. Some cell phone brands are notoriously difficult to implement recording/notifications specially Xiaomi/Huawei and Samsung.
Q:Why are the images/separate from the conversations itself?
A:The App was designed this way because one of it's purposes is to value users money and what they want or not to see. So for example, if i dont feel like speding mobile data to see the images my contacts send but i still want to text them i can do that. If for example i want to never see an image someone sent i also have that option.
